basic.description:
An introduction to the skills required to improvise in the jazz style. Students will develop their ability to improvise by analysing, listening and performing repertoire from the Swing and Bebop eras.
NOTE    Open to non-B.Mus. students by audition.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Introduction to Jazz Improvisation

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    Level 2 and registration in the B.Mus. program or permission of the instructor. 
NOTE    Open to non-B.Mus. students by audition.
